content:
Match each sentence with the corresponding definition.
A. Encyclopedia
B. Thesaurus
C. Dictionary
1. A collection of words and their definitions 
2. A reference work with information about a particular subject
3. A book of synonyms and antonyms

Sure, here is the correct matching of each sentence with the corresponding definition:

1. A collection of words and their definitions - C. Dictionary
2. A reference work with information about a particular subject - A. Encyclopedia
3. A book of synonyms and antonyms - B. Thesaurus
